sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* YEAA0080_2016.SEARCH00.연말정산내역 조회_근로소득지급명세 */ SF_GET_DEPTNAME(C.YEA_DEPT_CD) AS YEA_DEPT_NM /*부서명*/ ,A.YEA_EMP_NO /*사원번호*/ ,C.YEA_EMP_NM /*사원명*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_AOMT /*지급금액 + 기타소득*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM003 /*상여금액*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM004 /*인정상여*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM005 /*주식매수선택권행사이익*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM006 /*우리사주조합인출금*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM007 /*임원 퇴직소득금액 한도초과액*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NTAX /*비과세함계*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM015 /*소득세*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM016 /*주민세*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM017 /*농특세*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM021 /*국민연금*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM022 /*건강보험*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM023 /*고용보험*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NUM001 /*(종근무지)지급금액*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NUM002 /*(종근무지)상여금액*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NUM003 /*(종근무지)인정상여*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NUM004 /*(종근무지)주식매수선택권행사이익*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NUM005 /*(종근무지)우리사주조합인출금*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NUM006 /*(종근무지)임원 퇴직소득금액 한도초과액*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NTAX /*(종근무지)비과세함계*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NUM010 /*(종근무지)소득세*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NUM011 /*(종근무지)주민세*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NUM012 /*(종근무지)농특세*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NUM007 /*(종근무지)국민연금*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NUM008 /*(종근무지)건강보험*/ ,E.YEA_BFW_NUM009 /*(종근무지)고용보험*/ FROM YEA_INCDEC A LEFT JOIN YEA_YEPROC B ON A.YEA_STD_YY = B.YEA_STD_YY AND A.YEA_EMP_NO = B.YEA_EMP_NO LEFT JOIN TABLE(SF_YEA_MASTXD(#YEA_STD_YY# || '1231')) C ON A.YEA_EMP_NO = C.YEA_EMP_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEA_EMP_NO ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM001) + SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM002) AS YEA_PAY_AOMT /*지급금액 + 기타소득*/ ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM003) AS YEA_PAY_NUM003 /*상여금액*/ ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM004) AS YEA_PAY_NUM004 /*인정상여*/ ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM005) AS YEA_PAY_NUM005 /*주식매수선택권행사이익*/ ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM006) AS YEA_PAY_NUM006 /*우리사주조합인출금*/ ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM007) AS YEA_PAY_NUM007 /*임원 퇴직소득금액 한도초과액*/ ,SUM(NVL(YEA_PAY_NUM010,0) + NVL(YEA_PAY_NUM011,0) + NVL(YEA_PAY_NUM012,0) + NVL(YEA_PAY_NUM013,0)) AS YEA_PAY_NTAX /*비과세함계*/ ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM015) AS YEA_PAY_NUM015 /*소득세*/ ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM016) AS YEA_PAY_NUM016 /*주민세*/ ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM017) AS YEA_PAY_NUM017 /*농특세*/ ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM021) AS YEA_PAY_NUM021 /*국민연금*/ ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM022) AS YEA_PAY_NUM022 /*건강보험*/ ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM023) AS YEA_PAY_NUM023 /*고용보험*/ FROM YEA_PAYDTL WHERE YEA_STD_YY = #YEA_STD_YY# GROUP BY YEA_EMP_NO ) D ON A.YEA_EMP_NO = D.YEA_EMP_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.YEA_EMP_NO ,SUM(A.YEA_BFW_NUM001) AS YEA_BFW_NUM001 /*지급금액*/ ,SUM(A.YEA_BFW_NUM002) AS YEA_BFW_NUM002 /*상여금액*/ ,SUM(A.YEA_BFW_NUM003) AS YEA_BFW_NUM003 /*인정상여*/ ,SUM(A.YEA_BFW_NUM004) AS YEA_BFW_NUM004 /*주식매수선택권행사이익*/ ,SUM(A.YEA_BFW_NUM005) AS YEA_BFW_NUM005 /*우리사주조합인출금*/ ,SUM(A.YEA_BFW_NUM006) AS YEA_BFW_NUM006 /*임원 퇴직소득금액 한도초과액*/ ,SUM(B.YEA_BFW_NTAX) AS YEA_BFW_NTAX /*비과세함계*/ ,SUM(A.YEA_BFW_NUM010) AS YEA_BFW_NUM010 /*소득세*/ ,SUM(A.YEA_BFW_NUM011) AS YEA_BFW_NUM011 /*주민세*/ ,SUM(A.YEA_BFW_NUM012) AS YEA_BFW_NUM012 /*농특세*/ ,SUM(A.YEA_BFW_NUM007) AS YEA_BFW_NUM007 /*국민연금*/ ,SUM(A.YEA_BFW_NUM008) AS YEA_BFW_NUM008 /*건강보험*/ ,SUM(A.YEA_BFW_NUM009) AS YEA_BFW_NUM009 /*고용보험*/ FROM YEA_BFWORK A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEA_STD_YY ,YEA_EMP_NO ,YEA_BIZ_NO ,SUM(YEA_BFN_NUM001) AS YEA_BFW_NTAX FROM YEA_BFNTAX WHERE YEA_STD_YY = #YEA_STD_YY# GROUP BY YEA_STD_YY, YEA_EMP_NO, YEA_BIZ_NO ) B ON A.YEA_STD_YY = B.YEA_STD_YY AND A.YEA_EMP_NO = B.YEA_EMP_NO AND A.YEA_BIZ_NO = B.YEA_BIZ_NO WHERE A.YEA_STD_YY = #YEA_STD_YY# GROUP BY A.YEA_EMP_NO ) E ON A.YEA_EMP_NO = E.YEA_EMP_NO LEFT JOIN VI_YEA_DEPTXM Z ON #YEA_DEPT_CD# = Z.YEA_DEPT_CD WHERE A.YEA_STD_YY = #YEA_STD_YY# AND B.YEA_PRC_STR001 = '1' /*확정여부Y*/
SF_GET_CONTREMK(C.YEA_DEPT_CD) LIKE Z.YEA_DEPT_FULL_CD || '%'
A.YEA_EMP_NO = #YEA_EMP_NO#
( (#YEA_INOFFICE_CD# = '1' AND C.YEA_HIRE_YMD <= #YEA_STD_YY# || '1231' AND NVL(C.YEA_QUIT_YMD, '29991231') >= #YEA_STD_YY# || '121231') OR (#YEA_INOFFICE_CD# = '2' AND NVL(C.YEA_QUIT_YMD, '29991231') <= #YEA_STD_YY# || '1231' ) )
ORDER BY SF_GET_CONTREMK(C.YEA_DEPT_CD) , LPAD(C.YEA_POST_CD,5,'0') , C.YEA_RANK_CD , C.YEA_HIRE_YMD

SELECT /* YEAA0080_2016.SEARCH01.연말정산내역 조회_근로소득원청징수,정산내역*/ SF_GET_DEPTNAME(C.YEA_DEPT_CD) AS YEA_DEPT_NM /*부서명*/ ,A.YEA_EMP_NO /*사원번호*/ ,C.YEA_EMP_NM /*사원명*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM001 /*총급여*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM002 /*근로소득공제*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM003 /*근로소득금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM004 /*기본공제_본인*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM005 /*기본공제_배우자*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM006 /*기본공제_부양가족 수*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM007 /*기본공제_부양가족*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM008 /*추가공제_경로우대 수*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM009 /*추가공제_경로우대*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM010 /*추가공제_장애인 수*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM011 /*추가공제_장애인*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM012 /*추가공제_부녀자*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM013 /*추가공제_한부모*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM014 /*국민연금보험료*/ ,NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM015,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM016,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM017,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM018,0) AS YEA_PRC_SUM001 /*공무원,군인,사립학교교직원,별정우체국연금_기타연금*/ ,NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM019,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM020,0) AS YEA_PRC_SUM002 /*건강/고용 보험료*/ ,NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM021,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM022,0) AS YEA_PRC_SUM003 /*주택임차차입금_대출기관 + 주택임차차입금_거주자*/ ,NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM023,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM024,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM025,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM026,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM027,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM104,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM105,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM106,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM107,0) AS YEA_PRC_SUM004 /*장기주택저당차입금 [2015귀속]장기주택차입분 추가*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM028 /*기부금이월분*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM029 /*특별소득공제 계*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM030 /*차감소득금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM031 /*개인연금저축*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM032 /*소기업·소상공인 공제부금*/ ,NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM033,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM034,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM035,0) AS YEA_PRC_SUM005 /*청약저축+주택청약종합저축+근로자주택마련저축*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM036 /*투자조합출자 등*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM037 /*신용카드 등 사용액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM038 /*우리사주조합 출연금*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM040 /*고용유지 중소기업 근로자*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM041 /*목돈안드는전세이자상환액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM042 /*장기집합투자증권저축*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM043 /*그 박의 소득공제 계*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM044 /*특별공제 종합한도 초과액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM045 /*종합소득 과세표준*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM046 /*산출세액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM047 /*세액감면_소득세법*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM048 /*세액감면_조세특례제한법*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM049 /*세액감면_조세특례제한법 제30조*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM050 /*조세조약세액감면*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM051 /*세액감면 계*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM052 /*세액공제_근로소득*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM054 /*세액공제_자녀*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM055 /*과학기술인공제_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM056 /*과학기술인공제_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM057 /*근로자퇴직급여보장법_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM058 /*근로자퇴직급여보장법_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM059 /*연금저축_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM060 /*연금저축_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM061 /*보장성보험료_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM062 /*보장성보험료_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM063 /*의료비_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM064 /*의료비_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM065 /*교육비_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM066 /*교육비_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM067 /*정치자금기부금_10만원이하_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM068 /*정치자금기부금_10만원이하_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM069 /*정치자금기부금_10만원초과_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM070 /*정치자금기부금_10만원초과_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM071 /*법정기부금_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM072 /*법정기부금_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM039 /*[2015귀속]_변경 우리사주조합 기부금_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM108 /*[2015귀속]_추가 우리사주조합 기부금_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM073 /*지정기부금_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM074 /*지정기부금_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM075 /*특별세액공제계*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM076 /*표준세액공제*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM077 /*납세조합공제*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM078 /*주택차입금*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM079 /*외국납부*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM080 /*월세세액공제_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM081 /*월세세액공제_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM082 /*세액공제계*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM083 /*결정세액 소득세*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM084 /*결정세액 주민세*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM085 /*결정세액 농특세*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM086 /*종근무지소득세*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM087 /*종근무지주민세*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM088 /*종근무지농특세*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM089 /*주근무지소득세*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM090 /*주근무지주민세*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM091 /*주근무지농특세*/ ,NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM086,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM089,0) AS YEA_PRC_SUM006 /*종근무지소득세+주근무지소득세_기납부세액*/ ,NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM087,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM090,0) AS YEA_PRC_SUM007 /*종근무지주민세+주근무지주민세_기납부세액*/ ,NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM088,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM091,0) AS YEA_PRC_SUM008 /*종근무지농특세+주근무지농특세_기납부세액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM092 /*차감징수소득세*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM093 /*차감징수주민세*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM094 /*차감징수농특세*/ ,(NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM092,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM093,0) + NVL(B.YEA_PRC_NUM094,0)) * -1 AS YEA_PRC_SUM009 /*환급세액*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM018 /*납부특례세액_소득세*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM019 /*납부특례세액_지방소득세*/ ,D.YEA_PAY_NUM020 /*납부특례세액_농특세*/ /* 귀속년도2014년 연말정산 재정산(소급)*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM099 /*6세이하*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM101 /*출산입양*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM102 /*장애인전용보험료_공제대상금액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM103 /*장애인전용보험료_세액공제액*/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM109 /**/ ,B.YEA_PRC_NUM110 /**/ FROM YEA_INCDEC A LEFT JOIN YEA_YEPROC B ON A.YEA_STD_YY = B.YEA_STD_YY AND A.YEA_EMP_NO = B.YEA_EMP_NO LEFT JOIN TABLE(SF_YEA_MASTXD(#YEA_STD_YY# || '1231')) C ON A.YEA_EMP_NO = C.YEA_EMP_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM018) AS YEA_PAY_NUM018 ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM019) AS YEA_PAY_NUM019 ,SUM(YEA_PAY_NUM020) AS YEA_PAY_NUM020 ,YEA_STD_YY ,YEA_EMP_NO FROM YEA_PAYDTL WHERE YEA_STD_YY = #YEA_STD_YY# GROUP BY YEA_STD_YY, YEA_EMP_NO ) D ON D.YEA_STD_YY = A.YEA_STD_YY AND D.YEA_EMP_NO = A.YEA_EMP_NO LEFT JOIN VI_YEA_DEPTXM Z ON #YEA_DEPT_CD# = Z.YEA_DEPT_CD WHERE B.YEA_PRC_STR001 = '1' AND A.YEA_INC_STR025 = '1' AND A.YEA_STD_YY = #YEA_STD_YY#
SF_GET_CONTREMK(C.YEA_DEPT_CD) LIKE Z.YEA_DEPT_FULL_CD || '%'
A.YEA_EMP_NO = #YEA_EMP_NO#
( (#YEA_INOFFICE_CD# = '1' AND C.YEA_HIRE_YMD <= #YEA_STD_YY# || '1231' AND NVL(C.YEA_QUIT_YMD, '29991231') >= #YEA_STD_YY# || '121231') OR (#YEA_INOFFICE_CD# = '2' AND NVL(C.YEA_QUIT_YMD, '29991231') <= #YEA_STD_YY# || '1231' ) )
ORDER BY SF_GET_CONTREMK(C.YEA_DEPT_CD) , C.YEA_POST_CD , C.YEA_RANK_CD , C.YEA_PROMOTE_YMD
